channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description: how do i change wildy areas to safe zones?

item.title: Safe zones
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

search for “public boolean nonwild” and if you can’t find that try “public boolean insafezone” but anyway you will see a lot of codes

|| (absX >=####  && absX <=#### && absY >=####  && absY <=#### )

kind of like that but you should save that top part somewhere because it is the basic format to safezones

(absX >=#### is the lowest x coordinate
(absX <=#### is the greatest x coordinate
(absY >=#### is the lowest y coordinate
(absY <=#### is the greatest y coordinate

because if you read the code to yourself you think x coordiante greater than are equal to for the first one etc etc.

Read full topic
